title: [Sponsor] Nomorobo
content:
Whether you are red, blue, or in between, there’s one thing we can all agree on: no one likes political robocalls or texts. Every year they just seem to get worse.

But there is good news! While every candidate, campaign, and political party uses robocalls and texts to try to influence the 2024 election, Nomorobo is tracking them all and gives you control over who you want to hear from and who you don’t.

Use Nomorobo’s powerful tools to identify, block, and report the calls and texts you just don’t want to receive anymore, and we’ll do the rest.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
